name: Kronos Program
description:
Kronos Program is a sci fi fps platformer where the player must complete various challenges to progress through the game. These challenges include overcoming obstacles and defeating enemy robots. There are also additional Challenge Levels to test the player's skills.

===== CONTROLS =====

WASD to move

Left Click to shoot

Right Click to aim

Space to jump

C to Crouch

Space (Press and hold while in air) to use jetpack

Tab or P to open pause menu

F to reverse time

R to slow enemy projectiles
